data.name: Part 2 - New Hopes
data.detailed_description:
The Dawning Clocks of Time Part 2 DLC continues the storyline where you left off in Part One (Base Game).

Features:
-The quest across time and space continues with cinematic depth
-Explore the backstory of the Progenitors and more twists and turns along the way
-A whole new expansion to the RUNE GRID allow further character abilities and unique Energies.
-New armour and weapons for Kate as she becomes more powerful than before
data.about_the_game:
The Dawning Clocks of Time Part 2 DLC continues the storyline where you left off in Part One (Base Game).

Features:
-The quest across time and space continues with cinematic depth
-Explore the backstory of the Progenitors and more twists and turns along the way
-A whole new expansion to the RUNE GRID allow further character abilities and unique Energies.
-New armour and weapons for Kate as she becomes more powerful than before
data.short_description: The Dawning Clocks of Time Part Two - New Hopes continues the story where you left off in Part One (Middle War), adding new foes, planets and backstory along with additional player characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4GHz (7th Gen) or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti or higher 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4Ghz (8th Gen) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX series or higher 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
